title: submitsignature request parameters
description: submit the seal-hash and signature for sealing the new staking block

items.$comment: Should create a DATA128 and use that instead, but RPC generator doesn't support it yet.
items.description: 128 hex decimal characters with 0x prefix signature of new staking block.

items.$comment: Should create a DATA64 and use that instead, but RPC generator doesn't support it yet.
items.description: 64 hex decimal characters with 0x prefix seal-hash of new staking block.
